title: Morgan Stanley Sees 70% Surge for ASML Shares in Bull Case
description: Morgan Stanley laid out its bullish case for why investors should buy ASML Holding NV shares, saying in the most optimistic scenario the stock has a 70% rally ahead as chipmakers ramp up spending to meet soaring demand for artificial intelligence.

title: Intel Extends Comeback as Investors Bet on Foundry Growth
description: Intel Corp.’s dramatic rally to start the year shows investors are increasingly optimistic about the chipmaker gaining new foundry customers, putting it back into the artificial intelligence trade it appeared to abandon in 2024.
content:

title: New office for AI to 'explore opportunities'
description: A Manx Office for Artificial Intelligence will empower people to use the technology, its head says.
content:
Establishing an office focusing on Artificial Intelligence aims to "balance the opportunity" of the technology, with "making sure it is used appropriately", the executive heading up the project has said.

title: US stands to gain most from AI, even as job risks grow over time: WEF Report
description: Chief economists see artificial intelligence delivering rapid growth gains with modest job losses over the next two years, but warn employment risks rise sharply over the next decade, a WEF survey shows.
content: Artificial intelligence is fast becoming the defining macroeconomic force shaping global growth, jobs and productivity, according to the World Economic Forum’s latest Chief Economists’ Outlook, even as its benefits are expected to arrive unevenly acr... [1328 chars]

title: 97% of Indian firms to sustain AI spending regardless of ROI, above global overage of 94%: BCG report
description: Indian organizations are demonstrating a resilient commitment to artificial intelligence (AI), with 97 per cent of firms in the country stating they will continue to invest in the technology even if financial returns do not materialize within the next 12 months. This surpasses the global average of 94 per cent as companies worldwide prepare to double their AI spending in 2026.
content: New Delhi [India], January 16 (ANI): Indian organizations are demonstrating a resilient commitment to artificial intelligence (AI), with 97 per cent of firms in the country stating they will continue to invest in the technology even if financial retu... [3153 chars]

description: Merge Labs describes itself as "a research lab with the long-term mission of bridging biological and artificial intelligence to maximise human ability, agency, and experience."
